sections.heading: V school district; board of education; vice president; duties
sections.text: The vice president of the board of education of a Class V school district shall perform all the duties of the president in case of the president's absence or disability.SourceLaws 1891, c. 45, ยง 10, p. 320;R.S.1913, ยง 7018;C.S.1922, ยง 664
